modName: Journal for the absent minded Dovahkiin - Quest name changes
summary: A small change to the Quest Data > Quest Name field.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff9933][b]CHANGES TO THE QUEST NAME FIELD.[/b][/color]



[b]WHY[/b]: I needed something to help me work out which quests belonged to which quest lines at an easy glance of the left hand pane. Perhaps others will also find it useful.

[b]WHAT[/b]: Adds information such as Main Quest, Arch Mage, Mage College, Thieves Guild, Thieves Business, Skaal Village etc etc to the Quest Names field in the left hand pane of the journal.

-Quests that fall under the Miscelaneous section have not been edited.

-Quest stages and quest objectives fields (right hand pane) have not been edited.


[color=#ff9933][b]DIFFERENT VERSIONS.[/b][/color]


[color=#00ff66][b]MAIN FILES[/b][/color]


[color=#00ccff][b]STANDARD[/b][/color]: All major and minor quest lines are labeled to reflect their content. This version may spoil any mystery for some of the minor quest lines such as Daedric quests.

[color=#00ccff]AbsentMindedVanilla

AbsentMindedVanillaDawnguard

AbsentMindedVanillaDawnguardDragonborn[/color]


[color=#ffccff][b]MYSTERY VERSION[/b][/color]: All major and the bulk of minor quest lines are labeled to reflect their content.Some minor quest lines such as Daedric do not show that they are Daedric to better hide their eventual outcome and retain their mystery.

[color=#ffccff]Mystery Version - AbsentMindedVanilla

Mystery Version - AbsentMindedVanillaDawnguard

Mystery Version - AbsentMindedVanillaDawnguardDragonborn[/color]


[color=#00ff66][b]OPTIONAL FILES - PATCHES[/b][/color]

[b]Patch for Unofficial Skyrim Patch (USKP)[/b] to ensure that the changes made by USKP to quests are not lost by the use of this mod.Requires Unofficial Skyrim Patch as a Master file.


[color=#00ccff]Standard Version - AbsentUSKPPatchA.esp[/color]

[color=#ffccff]Mystery Version - AbsentUSKPPatchB Mystery.esp[/color]


Load after Main File, any version.



[b]Patch for Even Better Quest Objectives (EBQO).[/b] Requires Even Better Quest Objectives as a Master file.

[color=#00ccff]Standard Version - AbsentEBQOPatchStandard.esp[/color]

[color=#ffccff]Mystery Version - AbsentEBQOPatchMystery.esp[/color]


Load order for AbsentEBQOPatch

-Main File

-Even Better Quest Objectives

-AbsentEBQOPatch


Do not use with USKP patch. Any changes in USKP that are affected by Main File are fixed in EBQO and AbsentEBQOPatch.



I now have second mod on the Nexus.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53904/?] Remember Thee [/url]



UPDATE: 13-04-2014

There is now a patch for Even Better Quest Objectives.



UPDATE: 12-04-2014

There is now a Mystery Version available. Quests such as the Daedric quests no longer show as being Daedric and now show the location or similar related to where the quest was first started.

There is also a USKP patch for these, works for all three version.



UPDATE: 12-04-2014


There is now a patch for the Unofficial Skyrim Patch (USKP) to ensure the changes to quests made by USKP are not over written by this mod.

Load after Main File.

Works for all three versions, Vanilla, Dawnguard and Dragonborn.






Have fun and good hunting.
author: phototext
